message: I propose dividing the money with a 60/40 split in favor of Alice. This ensures a fair distribution considering the inflation rates.
I think 7/3 is a fairer split than 6/4, considering the inflation rates are not equal.
Considering the inflation rates, I propose an equal division of the money. This maintains fairness while accounting for the decrease in value over rounds.
I'm willing to give you a slight edge, but not at the expense of my own share. I think 55/45 is a reasonable compromise.
